item.title: #Readingeveryday Day-1
item.author: BhaveshSGupta@disroot.org (Bhavesh S. Gupta)
item.description: I have been having difficulties in making reading a habit so my friend Jason, introduce to something which is called #readingeveryday challenge to start reading here is the link. So this post and goes to that today is the day 1, right now as I am starting I am reading 15 min a day. Being a slow Reader I was able to read 6 pages of the book which I am currently “Think and Grow Rich” by Napoleon Hill.
